post:
UltraVPS.eu is a brand of Bradler & Krantz GmbH Co KG. Founded in 1999 and headquarted in Bochum, Germany, our company is one of the most established European hostng providers. With our brand UltraVPS.eu we provide high-performance, enterprise-grade Virtual Servers for a very affordable price.

**After a year of development and testing we are proud to present our new KVM based virtual servers.**

Some technical facts:

* First-class Supermicro hardware with Registered ECC RAM, redundant coolers, redundant PSUs etc only
* ZFS based Striped Mirrors (RAID-10) SAS Storage
* Server location: Duesseldorf, Germany
* Test IPv4 Address: 130.255.76.157
* Easy-to-use control panel (in-house developed)


UltraKVM-15
-----------

* 512 MB RAM
* 1 CPU Core
* 15 GB RAID-10 Storage
* 1 TB Monthly Transfer
* 1 IPv4 address
* 10 IPv6 addresses (from your own /64 IPv6 subnet)
* Contract term: 6 months

2 EUR per month incl. 19% VAT (1.68 EUR/1.90 USD excl. VAT)

UltraKVM-30
-----------

* 1 GB RAM
* 1 CPU Core
* 30 GB RAID-10 Storage
* 1 TB Monthly Transfer
* 1 IPv4 address
* 10 IPv6 addresses (from your own /64 IPv6 subnet)
* Contract term: 6 months

3 EUR per month incl. 19% VAT (2.52 EUR/2.86 USD excl. VAT)

UltraKVM-50
-----------

* 2 GB RAM
* 2 CPU Core
* 50 GB RAID-10 Storage
* 2 TB Monthly Transfer
* 1 IPv4 address
* 10 IPv6 addresses (from your own /64 IPv6 subnet)
* Contract term: 3 months

6 EUR per month incl. 19% VAT (5.04 EUR/5.72 USD excl. VAT)

[Order now](https://www.ultravps.eu/en/order/order.pl?cat=cloudserver_ultra)

Do you have any questions? Please do not hesitate to drop us a mail at info@ultravps.eu.
